TopicTitle: Access/Write to KSP's Option or Start menu + 1 question

Articles.Content:
Hi

Does anyone know how one may be able to access and write to the games own Option or Start menu ?

Is it possible to disable time-warp and/or the physics engine ? Or atleast in the case of the engine, delimit it's impact, by giving it a buffer zone where within that zone no object will break apart.
